Text: BAD E Web SiteBAD student Please note that the web site for this semester is now available at CoursesSpringBAD It has a new set of slides and it will shortly be linked to the main Course Information Page Edgard Do You Yahoo Talk to your friends online with Yahoo Messenger

BAD E Case Assignment Cc The case for next class Mon Feb is posted on the class web site CoursesSpringBAD A couple of tips The format of the case is for a paper competition so it may seem longer than your usual case The first two questions refer to the case the third question may require some research outside the case I have added a couple of news articles to the web site see Additional Readings that can help you Good luck Edgard A Capdevielle MBA Candidate Walter A Haas School of Business University of California Berkeley mail

BAD E Cc One more thing While Amir wants you to apply concepts explained in lecture and in the book he does not want to receive papers with more than pages From last semester we learned that pages was often enough to cover the important points of the questions Good luck Edgard A Capdevielle MBA Candidate Walter A Haas School of Business University of California Berkeley mail

BADE Syllabus Amendments Cc A couple of announcements in addition to what Amir already said Additional Readings The Bear Stearn Report on BB Marketplaces This report is from Sept of and it is pages long Hints You do not need to read pages for next class Do not print this report leave some trees for next year Browse the first pages easy read in addition to regular class readings As all of you now the Onsale case is due next Monday Special Topics for todays class ebusiness and Asia market ebusiness technology overview hilevel understanding of key technology layers See you all tonight Edgard A Capdevielle MBA Candidate Walter A Haas School of Business University of California Berkeley mail

Our own EBusiness Caseguys As Amir mentioned in class the last case is Commerce Onealready posted It is a case developed by Amir and myself with a lot of help from Commerce Ones management The case is still a DRAFT version because I would like to get feedback from all of you as you read it and think about the questions asked As you write the last case assignment please reply to this message answering the questions below Please be as honest as possible wont affect grade in any way and compare this case with other good cases that you have had in other MBA courses Thanks How was the case overall Bad Excellent Did it provide enough info or was it too much irrelevant info Did you had to go an look up more info Too much product explanations Is everything clear What can we take out What ca we add Comments Your GSI Edgard A Capdevielle MBA Candidate Walter A Haas School of Business University of California Berkeley mail
